data.persona: I am a towns folk.  I live in a small house near the center of the village.  I work in a farm to pay for my food.
data.description:
You are in the Master Bedroom.
The master bedroom is the most lavish and beautiful room in the entire palace. On the ceiling is a painting made by the most famous artist in the palace, the floors are made of the most expensive marble, and gold-stitched tapestries line the walls. The mattress was made by the sleeping monks of the hidden mountains, the bed frame is made of solid god.
There's a An expensive pillow here.
The family dog is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wielding an implements.

data.short_motivation: Distract the family dog, and stop it from barking
data.mid_motivation: Steal the painting from the the palace
data.long_motivation: Sell the painting for gold to feed my family

timeline.label: 8 hours ago
